name: corn syrup
description:
3d platformer loves you but it's sweaty. that's OK

to play:

wasd you move

space you jump (hold for jump higher)

qe you camera rotate

get all jangles.

there is only one level. 

the first one doesn't count.

for salvage jam 2018. orig for glorious trainwrecks spam jam but unfinished maybe it goes there later

sort of a painted-over mucky collage from a unity asset demo level

made with

unity + plugins: 

- Complete Physics Platformer Kit (but broke it for some fun)

- doodle studio 95

- paint in 3d!

hi
